materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"butrt","text":"Materials:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2ej9","text":"       PCR 8-tube strips or 96 well plates depending on sample# and gene# (General stores 4868)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":75,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ipgt","text":"       PCR strip tube lids  (General stores 1400-0800)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":29,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apqoq","text":"       ABI Sybr Green  (ABI 4301955)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":24,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fumrj","text":"       QPCR plate  (ABI 4309849)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":20,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48avq","text":"       Adhesive plate film  (ABI 4311971)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2ogu","text":"       Brown plastic adhesive helper","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arm11","text":"       Filtered 200 μl pipette tips (2 boxes for one complete plate)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mrat","text":"       Electronic Multichannel Pipette (referred to as Hilda from here on out)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvt7p","text":"       Primers – final concentration of 1.25 μM each","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"964jn","text":"       Autoclaved MilliQ H2O","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":26,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b7ln6","text":"Place 8-tube PCR strips in PCR tube racks (each single tube runs 1 sample and 1 gene)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4okj1","text":"Add 5 µl cDNA to the bottom of each tube, use 20 uL pipetor (keep on ice)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2q7ae","text":"Add 25 µl (duplicates) or 35 µl (triplicates) of Sybr Mastermix to the 8-well tube (keep on ice)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ehork","text":"Use 200uL multi-channel pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bii7p","text":"Mix using the multichannel and quick spin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o2mg","text":"Dispense 10 µl of cDNA/Mastermix (20uL pipetor) into each well on 384 well plate according to plate layout made in advance (keep plate on ice)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hheq","text":"Gently blot top of plate with kimwipe (to keep samples from transferring to other wells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6go4n","text":"Place clear Adhesive plate cover over the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a7593","text":"use brown ‘helper’ to smooth out","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e5o85","text":"pay attention to edges","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9f6j8","text":"work from center of the plate out","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3sa7r","text":"Spin plate for 5 min at 3500 rpm (4° C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bsn3","text":"During spin: set up ABI SDS program (keep plate in centrifuge until ready to run)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cr7vc","text":"Seal plate with sticky film. Vortex and spin down plate 3500rpm for 5 min at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7rv56","text":"Open SDS 2.3 program","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7hp13","text":"File -\u003e new","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ep3k","text":"One instrument tab: real time -\u003e Connect to machine -\u003e open/close door","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b3da8","text":" Insert plate, aligning A1 to A1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dbc1r","text":"Close door","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"evqb6","text":"On layout tab; highlight unused wells, click “omit wells”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"du984","text":"Highlight used wells and click “add detector” for each specific gene","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5eh8p","text":"Set to 10uL Rxn VL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"15hah","text":"Check cycle times and temperatures","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a3q6","text":"Add dissociation stage (SYBR primers only)             ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jdug","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2j4lu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0vet","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","","","","","","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100],"data":[["Temp C","50","95","95","60","95","60","95"],["Time","2:00","10:00","0:15","1:00","0:15","0:15","0:55"]],"guid":"D7BA67AAEF0C482C85FB944C2A89827C","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1bvo1","text":"Stage C\u0026D 40 time","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Temp C","50","95","95","60","95","60","95"],["Time","2:00","10:00","0:15","1:00","0:15","0:15","0:55"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c19pu","text":"Run plate     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"davvi","text":"Primer Validation Procedure: Set-up is same as above plus cDNA standard curve for each gene in an extra set of 8-tube PCR strips (see workflow file)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hijs","text":"Sample cDNA:  thaw your cDNA on ice (vortex and quick spin before plating)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":4},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":7,"length":4},{"style":"italic","offset":37,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epsj6","text":"        Primer stock (+/-): Add 12.5 µl of (+) and 12.5 µl (-) to 1 mL MilliQ H2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":79,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dd5ia","text":"  PCR Master Mix (10ul rxn; Triplicate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jtg3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ipje","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1dq4u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["190",100],"data":[["MilliQ H2O ","10.20ul"],["SYBR Green ","20ul"],["primers (2.5 μM each set) ","4.80ul"],["Total master mix ","35.00ul"]],"guid":"D735CF446D424EEB897289A23B3E4208","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"key":"b9hbf","text":"Equipment: ABI 7900 Prism ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["MilliQ H2O ","10.20ul"],["SYBR Green ","20ul"],["primers (2.5 μM each set) ","4.80ul"],["Total master mix ","35.00ul"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

title: Quantitative PCR, 384 well format
